text:
The Creator (2023) is an action, sci-fi thriller directed by Gareth Edwards, starring John David Washington as protagonist Joshua. In the midst of intense warfare between humans and AI, Joshua, a skilled former elite soldier mourning the loss of his missing wife, is recruited for a crucial mission to assassinate the "AI creator." He leads a team deep into the dangerous core of the AI domain, only to discover that the ultimate deadly weapon he must destroy is actually an innocent childlike AI...

The film was released on September 26, 2023, at Fantastic Fest, followed by its wide release on September 29, 2023, in the US. Its runtime spans 135 minutes. On IMDb, it holds a score of 7/10 based on 58,313 votes, whereas on Douban, it garners a rating of 6.2/10 from 4,470 reviews.
